markdown.markdown: I am a research geophysicist at DUG, specializing in Full-Waveform Inversion (FWI). Previously, I completed my Ph.D. in Geophysics at the University of Alberta (UofA) :canada:, where I conducted research under the guidance of Prof. Mauricio Sacchi. My Ph.D. research focused on developing deep-learning tools for solving inverse problems in seismic imaging and signal processing. Before finishing my Ph.D. and joining DUG, I earned a B.S. (2015) in geophysical engineering from Simon Bolivar University :venezuela: and an M.S. (2019) in computational geophysics from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro :brazil:. My expertise includes: * Inverse problems * Deep learning and scientific machine learning * Seismic imaging and full-waveform inversion * Signal processing * HPC * Oct, 2024: Our abstract on Vector Reflectivity Inversion with Full-Wavefield LSRTM and Sparse Regularization was accepted as an oral talk at the [Third EAGE Conference on Seismic Inversion](https://eage.eventsair.com/QuickEventWebsitePortal/seismic-inversion-2024/tp/Agenda/AgendaItemDetail?id=76c1ddb4-cc41-4391-ac2e-b22cb3c68ee1) :it: * Aug, 2024: I joined DUG as a research geophysicist :man_technologist: * Jul, 2024: I successfully defended my Ph.D. thesis :weight_lifting_man: * Jun, 2024: I gave a talk on [full-wavefield LSRTM using vector reflectivity with sparse regularization](https://www.earthdoc.org/content/papers/10.3997/2214-4609.2024101729) at the EAGE annual meeting :norway: * Jan, 2024: I gave several presentations on Reflection Waveform Inversion, Vector reflectivity Imaging and Deep-learning-based Seismic Inversion at [SAIG sponsors meeting](https://saig.physics.ualberta.ca/doku.php?id=publications:annualreports:saig_24p){target="_blank"} * Jun, 2023: I will attend and present at the EAGE 84th annual meeting :airplane::austria: * May, 2023: :chair: I chaired the machine learning session at the Geoconvention this year . I also presented recent work on deep learning synthesizers for LSM in the seismic imaging and FWI session * Apr, 2023: Our paper on nullspace networks for reflectivity inversion was accepted for publication on Geophysical Prospecting :fire: * Mar, 2023: I accepted an internship offer from Halliburton Landmark. I will be workig as a Geophysics intern in spring/summer 2023. :office: * Feb, 2023: I have been awarded the Alberta Innovates Scholarship :muscle: * Feb, 2023: I gave a talk at TGS on "Deep learning applications for seismic imaging" * Jan, 2023: I gave several presentations at [SAIG sponsors meeting](https://saig.physics.ualberta.ca/doku.php?id=publications:annualreports:saig_23p){target="_blank"} * Oct, 2022: I passed my PhD candicay exam! :beers:
